title: The Silver Fracture
goal: Witness the starfall and establish Kaelen's failing duty.
stakes_shift: Personal failure becomes a cosmic threat.

bridge.to_next: Kaelen flees the ruins with a forbidden relic.

sections.title: The Watchman's Vigil
sections.intent: Establish the setting and the character's isolation.

scenes.summary: Kaelen inspects the crumbling wards of the High Spire, feeling the weight of his thinning oath.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen realizes the wards cannot hold another night.

scenes.summary: A star streaks across the sky, turning from white to a sickly violet as it descends.
scenes.outcome: The star impacts the valley below, shattering the silence.

sections.title: The Impact Site
sections.intent: Introduce the primary threat and the inciting incident.

scenes.summary: Kaelen reaches the crater and finds the earth turned to razor-sharp glass.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen discovers a shard that pulses with a rhythmic, alien beat.

scenes.summary: Shadow-forms emerge from the glass, drawn to the shard's light.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen barely survives the first skirmish with the Void-touched.

scenes.summary: Kaelen claims the shard, feeling it bind to his remaining oath-essence.
scenes.outcome: The shard is now tied to Kaelen's life force.

sections.title: The Flight from High Spire
sections.intent: Force the protagonist into the world.

scenes.summary: Kaelen returns to the Spire to find his commander already corrupted by the fallout.
scenes.outcome: The Spire is compromised; the order is dead.

scenes.summary: A desperate duel through the burning archives to save the Star-Maps.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen kills Varkas and secures the maps.

scenes.summary: Kaelen leaps from the battlements as the Spire collapses into the void.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen is a fugitive with the only key to the star-fall.
